titleStmt.title: Cynthia with the tragical account of the unfortunate lovers of Almerin and Desdemona : being a novel illustrated with variety of the chances of fortune, morallized with many useful observations drawn from thence whereby the reader may reap both pleasure and profit / done by an English hand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Holt for T. Passinger ... and R. Fenner ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
